title: Writers Guild Writer
body:
Bounty Description:
Various writings to help users better understand mStable, governance and the protocol.

Desired Impact:
The guides are intended to help users to picture mstable and the protocol within the bigger picture of the ecosystem. How the various money legos could be combined in a powerful way. Also educating users to use save more often. 

With the Gov docs the intend is to educate the community and anyone outside on how the governance works in mStable. The goal is that anyone could potentially figure out how to participate in governance and submit proposals, and know, how to anticipate the procedure.

Applicant Address:
dimsome.eth
author: 0xC5e1569772b2d425Ac9469d39F17341C01e1CF4c
